## Get example data

```{r,eval=Ex}
library(geosmdata2)
osm_object <- get_osm_ways(object2="cycleway",place="Mannheim")
xml_obj <- xmlRoot(osm_object)
```


![Pic](http://www.msxfaq.de/code/xml01.gif)


[Xpath](https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/XPath), the XML Path Language, is a query language for selecting nodes from an XML document.
